overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto's social media presence spans across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, with a combined follower count of 3,580. Engagement is diversified across these platforms, with significant interaction on LinkedIn and Bluesky. Content focuses on academic achievements, research announcements, and recruitment, appealing to an audience interested in computational social science and disinformation studies.

contentThemes.description: Posts frequently highlight new research papers, grants, and breakthroughs in computational methods.
Announcements about job openings and collaboration opportunities in the field of computational social science.
Information about upcoming conferences and presentations related to disinformation and social media analysis.

recommendations: Increase the frequency of posts on LinkedIn to further capitalize on its higher engagement rates.
Leverage visual content and infographics to make complex research topics more accessible and engaging.
